root.name: Darwinia+
root.description: OverviewDarwinia is the result of Introversion Software's plan of bringing their award-winning game Darwinia over to Xbox Live. In the process it had a complete overhaul of the controls to suit consoles and gained a fully featured separate multiplayer component, Multiwinia which was released first on the PC. Avatar AwardsDarwinia features 2 avatar awards, both T-shirts. Red Darwinian T-Shirt - Win a game of Multiwinia. Does not have to be done online. Squaddie T-Shirt - (Achievement: The Bridge) Complete the Epilogue in Darwinia.
